ResearchProjectDef.label: Chemical X
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Discover the means of creating a valuable chemical enhancer that binds with existing drugs to create powerful concoctions.
“Chemistry is the dirty part of physics.” - Peter Reiss

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fiery explosives
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Craft volatile quicklime and use it to create pitch, grenades and deadly traps to set the battlefield aflame.
"The substance flows through my veins, and lives in the heart of every pyromancer. We respect its power." - Hallyne

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cheese making
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Learn how to make cheese from milk. Allows building cheese press.
"The poets have been mysteriously silent on the subject of cheese." - G. K. Chesterton

ResearchProjectDef.label: Butchering
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build a more advanced and efficient butchering table.
"The way you cut your meat reflects the way you live." - Confucius

ResearchProjectDef.label: Book making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use parchment and notes to record important things. Also learn how to produce paper from plants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Learn how to make basic furniture.
“No violence, gentlemen — no violence, I beg of you! Consider the furniture!” - Arthur Conan Doyle

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tailoring
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Learn how to make simple garments.
“Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society.” - Mark Twain

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metal crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Construct a simple forge to refine ores into simple crafts.
“Don’t judge someone until you’ve stood at his forge and worked with his hammer.” - Rick Riordan

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex games
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build complex and highly entertaining games to fulfill recreation.
"Games give you a chance to excel, and if you're playing in good company you don't even mind if you lose because you had the enjoyment of the company during the course of the game." - Gary Gygax

ResearchProjectDef.label: Art
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build a sculpture table to craft sculptures of various sizes.
"I created a vision of David in my mind and simply carved away everything that was not David." - Michelangelo

ResearchProjectDef.label: Quarry
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Make quarries to dig up rock chunks or coal.
"Who deserves more credit than the wife of a coal miner?” - Merle Travis
